channel.name: Dubai One En AE
channel.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
channel.desc: Drama 2015 An in-depth look at the renowned Indian mathematician Srinivasa Ramanujan's life and career with a particular emphasis on his academic pursuits at a university in the United Kingdom. Dev Patel, Jeremy Irons, Malcolm Sinclair, Raghuvir Joshi, Stephen Fry, Matt Brown, Matt Brown.
